import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Home.css'; import Profile from './Profile'; function Home() { const [user, setUser] = useState({ id: Profile.getId(), username: Profile.getUsername() }); const navigate = useNavigate(); console.log(user.id); console.log(user.username); function handleClick() { Profile.clearProfile(); navigate("/Login"); } return (

Home page.







) }; export default Home;
